cleaned_text: Crystal Infused Aromatherapy Roll-ons [](/products/crystal-infused-aromatherapy-roll-ons) Crystal Infused Aromatherapy Roll-ons Crystal infused essential oils, does it get any better? These wearable essential oil blends combine the therapeutic properties of essential oils with the matching energy of crystals. Available in: - Composed blend helps you find peace when feeling stressed and anxious - Courageous blend helps you keep you calm and confident to keep going when you're feeling nervous and anxious. - Empowered blend helps to promote a bold and spicy state of mind - Fortify blend helps to clear your mind and give you strength to keep on going - Insight blend to help clear the mind, reduce stress and uplifting the mood - Motivate bend helps to uplift your mood and energize - Passion blend helps to open your heart and promote the feeling of love - Purify blend helps to clear and protect your energy field - Resilient bled helps to keep you calm and collected when things feel unstable How it's Made What makes our blends so special... Hand blended and poured in small batches, we use only wild harvested, organic, or consciously harvested ingredients and the essential oils have been tested for purity. Ingredients per blend: - Composed: Fractionated Coconut Oil, Essential Oils: Lavender, Cypress, Patchouli, Geranium, Chamomile, Smoky Quartz Crystal Chips - Courageous: Fractionated Coconut oil, Essential Oils: Clary Sage, Geranium, Cedarwood, Sweet Orange, Chamomile, Carnelian Crystal Chip - Empowered: Fractionated Coconut Oil, Essential Oils: Lavender, Ylang Ylang, Cypress, Berry, Sweet Orange, - Fortify: Fractionated Coconut Oil, Essential Oils: Neroli, Orange, Ylang, Fluorite Crystal Chips - Insight: Fractionated Coconut Oil, Essential Oils: Lavender, Rosemary, Siberian Fir, Petitgrain, Fluorite Crystal Chips - Motivate:Fractionated Coconut Oil, Essential Oils: Mandarin, Lime, Peppermint, Geranium, Amethyst Crystal Chips - Passion: Fractionated Coconut Oil, Jojoba Wax, Essential Oils: Rose, Sandalwood, Jasmine, Ylang Ylang, Neroli, Rose Quartz Crystal Chips - Purify: Fractionated Coconut Oil, Essential Oils: Sage, Palo Santo, Lavender, Clear Quartz Crystal Chips - Resilient: Fractionated Coconut Oil, Essential Oils: Lavender, Lemon, Patchouli, Sodalite Crystal Chips Special Note for Roll-on... Due to the nature of essential oils and safe dilution guidelines, the aroma is more subtle than synthetic perfumes and do not have the stabilizers for long lasting aroma. As the skin absorbs the oils the aroma will become more faint but the therapeutic properties are still at work within your system. Tip... Due to the nature of using pure ingredients, the consistency of the product may change if exposed to varying temperatures. To ensure maximum product shelf life we suggest storing it tightly sealed in a cool, dark place Safety First! Caution... Do not use with children under 10 years of age. Caution... Do not use Composed or Resilient if pregnant or nursing. Caution... Do not use Motivate if you have a clotting disorders; cardia fibrillation; or G6PD deficiency For your safety, our products have been professionally formulated by a certified aromatherapist Safety Concerns... For external use only... Avoid eyes and mucous membranes... Keep out of reach from children and animals... If you are pregnant, have a medical condition, or taking medication please consult your physician before using any product Disclaimer... Products and statements have not been reviewed or approved by the FDA. Please consult a medical professional for any questions regarding your health care.
